useCase.name: Upload and Download File
useCase.trigger: Faculty member navigates to upload/download section

mainSequence.step: UI initiates upload for a file greater than 1GB
Check file size and type; If file is larger than 1GB, split file into chunks
Storage system confirms successful storage of file/data chunks
Set access permissions for download by users
Upload success message displayed with access details
FacultyMember shares file download link with users
User navigates to shared download link
Request to download file greater than 1GB is made
Check access permissions by Access Management
Preparing file for download, reassembling file if needed
File download request fulfilled by providing the file
File download starts for the user
